p: Extracts samples (7.5 mg) were dissolved in 25 mL of methanol and 100 Î¼L aliquots were taken for analysis by the Folin-Ciocalteu method, which is based on the oxyreduction reactions between the phenolic compounds and metal ions, causing the formation of a blue complex, which is absorbed at 750 nm [ 17]. A standard curve was prepared with gallic acid. Indicate formula used in the calculation of total phenol content and total flavonoid content. The equation for the calibration curve of gallic acid was Y = 0.0013X - 0.018, where X is the concentration of gallic acid, Y is the absorbance at 750 nm, and the correlation coefficient R = 0.998. All analyses for calculations of total phenol content were performed in triplicate. The results were analyzed by Microsoft Excel 2010 [ 18].
